Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then place a small amount of crushed salt or vinegar-soaked gauze into the wound, leave it there until the next day, and treat it with an appropriate remedy to ensure it heals properly.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the nail is not sensitive and you cannot insert the needle into it, or if it is not embedded in there already, then this particular type of nail condition can be treated with medicine. It will heal as I have previously explained in the section on divisions.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish to incise it, then open the wound of the patient and take a fine lion's spatula with a sharpened edge according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with delicacy.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	If you find that it is softened and confined with rust, then apply to the wound some of your own urine mixed with vinegar-soaked gauze or with pure alum or crushed salt, leave the wound overnight.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat the operation by removing everything that is infected or damaged in him, but do not touch the abscess if it is still enclosed under the skin; instead, wait until you see its beginning and cure the abscess while it is still in this early stage.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat your operation on that area with caution until it is completely healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	If the bulging of the tear duct causes great harm, it should be suspended using a string (or thread); make an incision in that area from one side only, and do not extend the cut too far to avoid cutting into the tears ducts.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And then, apply a mild distillation of rosewater and wash the eye until it is healed.

De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Regarding the incision of abscesses and the removal of flesh that has become infected in the wound:
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Some wounds in the eyes may develop fleshy growths that cover the pupil partially or entirely and press against the eyelids, causing them to swell and become tight at the outer corners, resembling a banister's railing.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	When the incision is complete and all that flesh has been cut away, fill up the wound with powdered salt or distil into it powder of roasted roots and substances similar to those of corrosive medicines, and spread upon the wound from without as much egg white as will suffice for securing the wound closed.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if there remains any cause for concern because of some inflammation and the blood appears to be infected, and you fear an abscess may arise, then open up the wound and treat that abscess with whatever will cure it, and thereafter repeat the operation on this [patient] until he is healed; similarly do regarding the adjusted flesh which occurs in the wound of this type.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, you should know that any healing of the groin wound must be done by nature or accident, not with iron, and you shouldn't put your hand in any of these operations until you see that the member is able to bear such an operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter 18.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On the collection of pus in the wound.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Pus is formed from the tissues and roots which are hardened on top of the wound and prevent its cure, and it impedes the healing of the wound over many days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, it is necessary at the beginning to consider if the wound in which he is wounded is strong and there is no other disease in him, then you collect that (wound).
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And you should instruct the patient to place their head in your lap, then suspend those veins with an ounce or two according to your discretion. And let that ounce be of fine cloth, made like this:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	Here are two ounces greatly in one body according to this form:" 
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And then those veins should be gently gathered with subtle forceps, with care and precision, and wipe away the blood as you go, until you see those veins being emptied of their contents and are thoroughly cleansed.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	Make sure you do not let the contents of the veins drip onto the patient's extremities or the spine; and if your operation is performed in midday under the sun, be very careful during the procedure to only incise those specific veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have finished, then you shall distill the contents into a clear or red vessel so that with its sharpness it may corrode what has been extracted from the blood.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if it is not possible for you to gather everything at that time, then apply a plaster made with what soothes his pain, and let him rest for a few days until his pain subsides and any suppurating wounds are healed.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the procedure on him in the same manner until he is healed.

De reduccio de arizati al nas.	On reducing a dislocation of the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat a dislocation with cautery or acute caustic medicine and it is not preceded by the narration of its occurrence (i.e., the patient did not narrate when the injury happened), then do not become angry but instead open up the abscess to allow for its maturation, extracting all the moisture from it until the bone becomes visible.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And when the bone is exposed and you see corruption or discoloration on it, then you must scrape it with an instrument of this shape:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called an asper cap, and it should be made of iron. The head should be rounded like a nut, and it must be punctured with fine file marks or else smoothed with a chisel, as follows:
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	Place the instrument on the corrupted bone, and then turn it around in the described areas while pressing your hand gradually until you know that the corruption has been scraped off.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	And this should be done several times, and then restore the area with drying and astringent agents.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	Therefore, if the wound is consolidated, new healthy flesh has grown in, and the body is separated from the illness, remaining like this for forty days without any renewal or inflammation, then you know it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	And if not, it is necessary to reduce the fissure to the shape of the nose and do so in this manner: you must uncover the bone either with an iron instrument or with acute medicine. And once the bone is uncovered, take this tribe according to its form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the extremity of the iron be triangular, and its handle should be thin at first, extending towards the end like this.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Then place the instrument over the bone, which should be near the lacrimal bone; stretch your hand a little bit outwardly and then turn your hand with the tribe until it penetrates all of the bones. The patient will feel this when they pull their hands back due to the pain.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Therefore, restore the area with drying and astringent medicines as you have been taught.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Therefore, when the flesh and the area have hardened, then the matter which overflowed to the outer parts returns into the nose, so this is lighter for the patient.

De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	I have considered several possibilities, but I was unable to find a definitive translation for this phrase in the context of medieval medical terminology or texts. 
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the wound appears complete and there is no damage or reduction in the anus, it is appropriate to let go of the patient, then follow them up, and then place vents on their neck without scarification or suction for good evacuation; and then apply a liniment made with acacia, aloe, incense, and tragacanth over the wound, and then fasten the poultice firmly onto the wound with lots of powder.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	The way to make the powder is by taking lion's skin cloths in pieces, each cloth duplicated into four folds; and make those bits.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then place these pieces one on top of the other according to the amount that the wound requires.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Then secure over these with a hard cloth firmly; and repeat the vents with suction without scarification, and then remove the vents and let the wound remain open day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	But if meanwhile the ligament becomes softened, it is appropriate to be more tight.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then remove the bandage during the day and night as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if you see the wound already reduced, well, and if not, then repeat the poultice with the powder and the binding and the vents until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	Regarding the incision of the prominence of the uveal tunic (or iris).
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is a rupture in the uveal tunic (iris), and it becomes prominent like a grape stem with its stalk protruding outwards and forming a human figure, if you want to operate on this condition, proceed as follows: insert the needle into the root of the iris at the lower part towards the upper part, then place another needle from the side of the lacrimal gland with double thread attached. Allow one needle to penetrate while withdrawing the first; cut the site of the double thread and lift up the section of the iris along the circle formed by the needle, tying off the end securely.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Remove the needle, place it over a swab infused with hen's egg white, allowing the thread to soak up the substance and deliver it to the iris (uvea).
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then treat this with something that comforts and heals the affected area until it is cured.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And on some occasions (you will) surround the entire area with a circular piece of cloth over which is placed a large, prominent grain; this should be perforated with a fine spatula that reaches up to the surface layer of the eye, allowing white fluid to run out. The grain should then be removed promptly.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	And then ensure that he is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22. 
De curacio de alconati.	De curacio de alconati.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquella. 
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not go down further, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	But if the descent to health is not prepared as we have said, then make the patient lie down between your hands; then take fine sponge and place it on a linen cloth near the continuation of the conjunctiva with the cornea in the crown (towards the root), while the wound is forgotten about.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Once the wound is forgotten about (i.e., healed), then you may apply to it a distilled water in which you have mixed honey or an infused water with boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then, it is treated with the other known causes until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	It seems that this was the 22nd chapter of your medieval medical treatise. Is there another passage you would like me to translate?
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On the treatment of water descending from the brain." 
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	Sure! Here's my translation of the text you provided: 
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Now make sure that you position the patient between your arms on a stool and bind his waist tightly.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Then place your left hand near the patient's left eyelid if it is from there that the water comes out or use your right hand if the eye on the right side is affected.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Then take the cotton with your right hand if it is from the left eye that the water comes out or use your left hand if the discharge is from the right eye.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Now place the tip of the cotton near the edge for its thickness in the white part of the eye on the side of the smallest tear duct and then remove it with dexterity by turning your hand to that side.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Next, penetrate the white part of the eye and feel that the cotton has already reached due to resistance.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Ensure that the length of cotton you have introduced is equal to the distance between the pupil and the end of the black part, which corresponds to the edge of the eye; this way, with your other eye, you will be able to see through the clarity of the cornea the pupil of the affected eye.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	And then rest for a moment; therefore, if the water has descended, you must remove that other one before an egg is thrown.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And when it is dry and does not descend, you must extract the egg easily, turn it with your hand little by little, then dissolve a bit of clear gem salt in the water and wash the wound inside; afterwards put out the end of the wound or cotton stopple or wool infused in rose oil and egg white, and tie up the wound with this.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	May we and those of our time put on that raw onion with egg white.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if you do not obey the egg to enter the wound because of its hardness -- for there are men whose wounds are very hard -- then take the spatula which is called *alberid*, and it has this form:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And so you will pierce with it that joint, but do not finish your hand in the hole, and there is nothing else except to make a way for the egg to enter gently.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And then introduce the egg as we have said.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And note its nature for it is delicate, and do not touch the top of his head on either the right or left side at all.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And it will be bandaged according to its position by the third day.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	Then untie him from that dark place and bring him into the open air; let him see some things, and then re-bandage him by the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And it is not necessary to do this during the hour of treatment, or soon after the infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	Later, it is necessary to avoid this due to the ease with which water may pass too quickly through him, given his weakened state.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	But if an abscess occurs suddenly, it is necessary to untie him before the seventh day and treat that which causes the abscess.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Then cover his eyes with a cloth and place a glass over the eye through which he can see; let him rest for some days in a dark place.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	Then gradually move them out of the dark space, allowing them to talk about what they see.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And know that for the student, the vision of blood is not exempted from fear at first sight, and therefore you should be bold in operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	We have heard from some of those who practice the Art of Surgery, and one said that they made fire in the armpit without piercing it by sucking out water.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But I have never seen anyone in our land who has perfected this technique, nor is it written about in any of the ancient books; it's possible that this method is new.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	These are the ways of practicing sucking, for those who wish to learn this technique:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	Whether they are made of horn or iron, and whether their ends are tapered or pointed, the acute end is always sharp.
Capitol .xxiv.	It seems that this indicates a chapter division in the text, specifically Chapter XXIV (24). Is there another portion of the text you would like me to translate or explain?
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Regarding the treatment of flesh in the nose:
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When different flesh grows in the nose due to a cause resembling a scorpion's sting or a polyp; this ailment is called 'polypus' as it resembles that particular kind of sea creature.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And his flesh is cancerous, scaly, of a dark color; and it is not flesh that is yellow but rather of a dark color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	So, for one who has this non-fraudulent and non-cancerous lion flesh (leprosy), you must make the patient sit between your two hands and place him in the sun, open his nose, and pick his scabs on that flesh.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then extract that from the divided parts outside, and with a sharp, thin spatula, separate what you have grasped of that thing from one division to another until you know that all the flesh has been removed; for if there remains in it any cause from which separation is possible, then take that out with one of the fine instruments with ease while there remains no cause.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	But if it should happen to him with blood or there is an evil abscess, then you must put on it what ought to be; or if it is one of the malignant abscesses, then treat and cauterize that thing so that it may be cut off from the blood and all the cavities may be scraped.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	Then, if it has been cut in the nose, then apply vinegar and water or wine.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	But if the nose is open and you introduce moisture into the palate, then know that it has already healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	But if the moisture does not penetrate as it should, then you know that inside there is still raw flesh over the highest bones of the nose to which the abrasion has not reached.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Therefore, it is necessary to insert waxed thread into it, of which there should be some thickness, and place several small nuts in it, leaving the length of a finger or less between each nut, then push the patient's nose with the rod or any other instrument that can reach inside.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And when you have done this, pull your excrement inside so that it reaches the nostrils' channels, and let it exit onto your collar, because veiled faces during this action are common among children at school, and it is a light cause for those who want to do it.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then secure the two ends of the thread, one end hanging over the nose and the other remaining inside it, and then apply a lock of meat to the nuts that are on the thread, doing this until you know that the flesh has reached the nuts on the thread.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then extract the bile and apply a caustic medicine to the nose, perform bloodletting with a cup for three days or more until the ointment corrupts everything that is rotten in the flesh.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	At the end of this procedure, insert a leaden tube into the nose for several days until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	If you desire quicker healing, use this method.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	This is the design of the purging instrument that distills oils and medicines into the nose:
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	Here is the translation of the first source sentence: 
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers. Capitol .xxv.	Certainly! Here is my attempt at translating each line of the given text into English:
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	From boils born at the ends of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Small bumps that are born at the ends of the nose, and it is important to note that these sores can worsen if left untreated for a few days.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And so it is necessary to treat them at the beginning of their appearance, and inherit all that has been advised.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Then apply to the affected area either a cautery or medicine that will burn, depending on what is available.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	However, if it has been left untreated and has become large, then consider if it is hardened, black in colour, and with little feeling; in which case do not touch it with iron as this is a deep-rooted abscess; those small bumps that you treat on this abscess will cause great harm to whoever it had.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is soft to touch and not black in colour, and you believe incision is possible on it, then evacuate the patient and make an incision without fear; treat the area with something that will constrict it until it is healed.

De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	When it comes to sewing up the nose and lips or ear, in case continuity is lost due to some ulcer or alike.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when there is discharge of continuity in one of these cartilages, it rarely matters in that operation except for some men.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Thus child, when you encounter any cause of these, consider whether it is a fresh ulcer with its blood, and then adjust the two lips of the wound with suture, and take care that it heals.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the lips of the wound are already separated and each is made healthy, then child you should cut off every part of its chain appearing within until no blood comes out.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two lips with suture and tighten them, and over them sprinkle dragon's blood and powdered tin, and place a piece of daffynicon cataplasm or any other consolidating plaster on it, and leave that bound for two or three days, then untie it and change the plaster and let it be until scabs form, and finally cure with ointment so that it heals.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.

De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	For the extraction of that cause which comes in the two lips within the gums.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors. Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat. Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter 28: The Use of Medicine in Fever
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	On the incision for tight flesh in the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	When dealing with swollen flesh over the gums, which the ancients called 'albulus', it is necessary to suspend that part using a thread or hold it with forceps and make an incision at its base, allowing the blood or pus to flow out until it heals.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then place dry sage or other styptic/caustic powders on the affected area.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns, make another incision and cauterize it; the cautery will prevent its recurrence.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter 29: On Fistula in Ano
De razo de dentz am ferr.	On the extraction of teeth with an iron instrument.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When on the surface of the separated inner teeth and front teeth and between the gums, rough scabs are formed, some with blisters, and some become blackened while others turn yellow or green, causing corruption in the gum which makes these weak teeth.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	And so you must make the patient lie between your arms and place his head on your knee, then scrape off those scabs with a file until nothing but the dentin is left; this procedure eliminates the cause of blackening, yellowness, greenness or other discoloration.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	If any of the above is unclear to you, then understand that this procedure applies only when blackening, yellowness and greenness are found at the start of the root; otherwise repeat the treatment on subsequent days until your goal is reached.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	Know that teeth have many shapes of roots, varying in form and figure according to their preparation for your operation.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And so the tool used to extract an inner tooth is different from that used between teeth. You must prepare these tools in various shapes which will soon be shown.
Capitol .xxx.	Chapter 30.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	Tooth extraction.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	If you cure the tooth of its pain with any tool and delay its extraction entirely, there is no reason that prevents the loss of it when it is extracted, as it is a noble substance among those excused from extraction.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	But when the patient is forced to have that tooth extracted, you must be firmly certain which tooth is painful, because many healthy teeth cause pain and deceive the patient, and you extract one of those, but then the pain does not cease until the sick and painful tooth is removed, for we have seen this through facial operations.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	So how should you be certain which is the painful tooth and know it well, then you must make an incision in its socket with a spatula that has some edge to it, so that it is separated from the tooth's gum on all sides, and then grab that with your aforementioned tweezers or subtle forceps at the beginning little by little until you extract it.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	And then attach to it strong pliers for a good grip or sturdy handle, and place the patient's head between your knees so that you have him well held, and then pull on the tooth according to its shape in such a way that you do not break it nor give the patient any greater pain.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And therefore, if it is not forgotten, then take one of those instruments and place it under them on all sides with ease, and exert force to remove it as was done at the beginning.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	But if the tooth is shaken or worn down, you should ensure that you wrap it with a piece of cloth and tighten the ends with a thin cord so that it does not get damaged when you grip it with forceps.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	Make sure you carefully perform scarification all around the gums and be mindful of your strength to avoid breaking them and leaving a piece inside; this is because the subsequent pain will be worse than the initial one.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	Be aware that you should not do what some ignorant barbers do in their haste and boldness during tooth extraction without administering what we have recommended; for many times, they cause severe illnesses upon men which are more difficult to treat than the initial ailment, with roots left inside or even extracting them along with part of the jaw bone as has been testified by many.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	And then, after extracting it, you should rinse the mouth with vinegar or sour wine mixed with salt.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the forceps and delicate pincers has its jaws at the beginning with a long thin extremity, short handle and thick, so that they are not bent when you have to act with them.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And there may be times when you have thick handles instead so that they are not bent even with short extremities.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	And they are made of Indian iron with straight extremities and at the extremities there are teeth which interlock into each other gripping tightly, or sometimes the extremities have the shape of a bird's beak called a stork that is a kind of gannet and has a strong grip.

De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	On the extraction of teeth and removal of jaw bones that have been fractured.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you have to extract a tooth that is fractured for any reason, it is necessary that you apply a poultice on the spot with lint until the place becomes soft; then introduce pincers or tongs whose extremities are like the beak of an avian called a stork or gannet, in the shape of forceps:
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	Let the ends of them be made within as with a file or sponge.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if they do not obey you with this instruction take these forceps or pincers; but if that does not work either, then you must cut over the vein and strip away all the flesh and insert this instrument which is called an atali, it is a small lever of this shape:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	It should be somewhat blunt at one end but small in diameter, and it must not be oiled lest it slip.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	So if by this the vein is pierced, it is done; but if not, help yourself with these other instruments whose shapes are as follows: the shape of the first instrument has a triangular end that tapers to some thickness:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The form of the second instrument is that it should be even more pointed and triangular.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And you have already been helped with these instruments, having two levers of which this is the form, followed by the next:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	And other instruments which I will describe in the removal of teeth, for this operation is performed with an instrument resembling a large ounce and whose shape is thus:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	Of the triangular deformed extremity, which is somewhat thick and not bound up lest it should be compressed.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And you must also know that the instruments for extracting teeth are in like manner similar to other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	But the wise and skilled craftsman finds for himself, according to what the operation signifies and from the various diseases which afflict us, the appropriate instruments; because ancient physicians did not prescribe nor provide any specific instruments for the different kinds of ailments.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	But if the bone of the jaw or other bones in the mouth are dislocated and you must push them back into place, then be careful to use what is suitable for this among the instruments and forceps we have mentioned for extracting teeth roots; and let someone assist with a tool that has this shape:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And if there is any small swelling that gradually appears and becomes constricted or trapped in the mouth so that it does not desiccate nor escape before the bone has completely perforated, then restore its place with appropriate medicines.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	But if there is a slight dislocation in the bone, then cut away that part of the dislocated piece and its blackness; cure it while being careful not to injure anything else.

De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	Of the cure of teeth, which are more prominent than others.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When teeth are prominent but not according to their natural form and shape, especially in women, and more so in elderly venerable ladies, you must consider: if one tooth is immediately next to another tooth, and it cannot be treated with any medication or lining of it, then extract that tooth; but if it is not attached to another tooth, then you incise that tooth with this instrument which has this shape; it should resemble a pig's tusk and be made of Indian iron with a very sharp point.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And let your incision be such that you incise that tooth over many days because of the hardness of the tooth, and that it does not harm any other teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the prominent tooth is exposed to filing, then file it with an Indian iron file of this shape:" (likely referring to an illustration or diagram).
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And it should be entirely made of Indian iron and its edge should be sharp; and it should have small points like those on a needle file, with which the tooth can be filed little by little over several days without harming or loosening any other teeth.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And then you must clean it thoroughly at the end, and remove any hair with some kind of razor.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if there is a wound inside [the mouth] and you touch the tongue with it, then you must smooth that area until its roughness is removed and flattened, so that the tongue does not hurt or corrupt speech.
Capitol .xxxiii.	I apologize, but I don't understand your request. Can you please provide more context or clarify what you would like me to do with "Capitol .xxxiii."?
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	On the restoration of damaged teeth using gold or silver wire.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When there is damage to the front teeth due to concussion and displacement from impact or a fall, and the patient cannot chew properly, you have treated it with astringent medicines, but your treatment has not been effective, then do not use silver wire for fixation as this turns black and will need to be replaced after some days. Gold wire, however, is never altered.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	The wire should be of such fineness and thickness that it can fit between the teeth; its shape is such that you take the wire and make it twice as long as the space between two healthy teeth, then you twist both ends of the wire so they reach from one damaged tooth to a healthy one on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then repeat the procedure by inserting the tissue back into the opening you started with, and press your hand gently with care and wisdom so as not to cause further harm.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And your compression should be such that you squeeze the gallbladder, taking care not to extract its roots or teeth.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	Then carefully separate the superfluous extremities of the gallbladder using forceps or scissors, and place them aside with care. Next, convert these and hide them between a healthy tooth and a damaged one to avoid injuring the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then release it as tight as a bowstring.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	If it becomes untied or broken, tighten it again with another gallbladder in such a manner until its time is complete.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	This is how the teeth are arranged and the shape of their alignment when two healthy teeth and two damaged ones are tied together:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when it is done that a tooth or two are returned to their sockets and they regrow as we have described, and they remain healthy.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And do not do this unless you are an expert or wise.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	In some cases, a piece of cow bone is adapted and shaped like a tooth; it is placed in the location where the missing tooth should be, tied securely as mentioned earlier, and left to stay there for an extended period.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter 34.
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Regarding the incision of the ligament that affects speech, prevent any talking.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament that is attached to the tongue may be either naturally present in some individuals or it could have formed accidentally due to an injury which has already healed.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	The operation involves opening the patient's mouth while keeping their head fixed in place; lift up their tongue and carefully incise the nerve ligament along its length until the tongue is released from its enclosure.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	If there is any hardness or knot present in the area due to scarring from an old injury, then use a lancet and cut through that scar along its length as you have already cut through the ligament.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And be careful not to make a fissure in the bone, and that you do not cut here through arteries or veins, causing blood flow.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	Then wash the traces of the incision with clean water, vinegar or fresh water; and place a piece of linen under their tongue; it is necessary to keep the patient with their mouth open every night so that they do not consolidate again.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	But if there is blood flow, place crushed vitriol on the spot; but if the bleeding stops, then cauterize the area with a cautery iron suitable for this case.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	Then cure him with other remedies until he is healed.

De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	On the extraction of a ranula under the tongue.
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Sometimes, under the tongue, small blisters occur that are similar to ulcers, hindering the tongue's natural movement and causing great swelling within the mouth.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	The treatment for this is to open the patient's mouth sixty degrees facing the sun and examine the blisters.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	If you observe that the blisters are dark or black in colour, hard and insensitive to touch for the patient, then do not disturb them.
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	If they turn white and become moist, indicating suppuration, then place your thumb on them and make an incision with a fine-pointed instrument, dividing it into several parts; if blood comes out during the procedure, apply powdered gypsum or vitriol to stop the bleeding.
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then return to the initial treatment by applying a dressing of vinegar and salt; continue this alternate therapy with water until it is completely healed.

De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	On the extraction of abscesses from both ears, or one that is located in the neck, as well as other abscesses.
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	When there is an issue in the throat area, these are glands that are swollen and appear outside, known as two ears. When you treat them with what we've discussed earlier in the division and it doesn't heal, then consider if the abscess is hard, dark-colored, and has little sensitivity; in such a case, do not touch it with an iron instrument.
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	And if it is of red color and the root is thick, then do not touch it with an iron instrument due to the flow of blood; instead, let it mature on its own, and later either you will cut it or it will break by itself.
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	And if it is of white color, soft, and its root is delicate, then it must be incised.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	Before performing the operation on the patient, you must consider whether the abscess has already reached its full development or if it has diminished in any way. Then, expose the patient to sunlight and place their head under your shade; open their mouth, and have an assistant hold their tongue with a noble instrument of this shape: [describe the instrument's shape].
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	It is made of silver or steel and it must be as thin as a knife's edge.
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	Therefore, when you press their tongue and the abscess is shown to you, grab it with your instrument (vezement), then take hold of it and place it in the amnion, and pull it out as much as you can.
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	Here is another cause of the disease that arises from the membranes; now make an incision in it with this tool, which has the following shape:
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	It is assembled like a forceps, but its ends are curved so that the hole of each one is in line with the other, very sharp, and made of iron.
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	If this tool is not available to you, make an incision with this spatulate instrument, which has the following shape: It is pointed on one side and blunt on the other.

But if it bleeds, heal with decoction water from pomegranate rind or myrtle leaves and similar astringent causes until the bleeding stops, then treat it so that it heals.

E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	And the abscess had grown so large that it now has two roots through which pus is discharged.
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	I treated it surgically by making an incision into one of its roots and extracting the object; a large portion was pulled out along with it. Then I made another incision in the area from which the other root emanated, after that I forced open the abscess's mouth and compressed his tongue inside. Finally, I placed a sponge into this abscess.
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	And after cutting out a large portion of it, there was only a small amount of blood flowing from the wound.
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	So the woman's wound is now completely healed and she begins to drink water and eat again. I continued to make incisions in the abscess many times over a long period of time, until eventually another abscess appeared where the first one had been. I kept making incisions into this new growth as it prolonged.
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	Then I brought some burning hot iron and cauterized the wound, after that I left and walked away not knowing what God had in store for me.

De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada."

E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.	E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa:
E cove que no inscidas aquela sino aquo que es ajustat sobre le terme natural ses addicio, quar si tu inscides de lu mays, lediyras le sieu parlar.	And you must not cut into it beyond what is naturally appropriate without any addition, because if you cut deeper, you will take away his ability to speak.
E aprop la inscizio, usa de aquo le qual havem recomtat en la inscizio de dos mellas, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	Then for the incision, use what we have previously measured in a two-fold manner during the incision, and ensure it heals properly.
Mays si era le malaute espaventat per la inscizio de lu, cove que use de engen en la cauterizacio de lu ses temor, e la manieyra del cauteri en lu no es sino am aygua aguda, e es que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se, e aprop prem la lengua de lu am le instrument le qual havem dit, e aprop pren de l’aygua la qual havem dita en le capitol de cauterizacio, e comfeys am aquela caus viva, e pausa aquela no spessa ni subtil, e de aquela omple la concavitat de l’estrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	If the patient is scared of the incision process, you must employ skill and caution in cauterizing him without causing fear. The way to use the cautery on him should only involve hot water; place his head in your lap, then press his tongue with the instrument we mentioned earlier, then take the water described previously in the chapter on cauterization, mix it with a live coal, and fill the hollow of this instrument, which has such a shape:
Sia la extramitat de lu conquavitat en la qual sia pausada la medicina ayssi cum la conquavitat de culher de ray, e pausa le strument am la medicina sobre la vula, e·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu latz per so que corro saliva o musellage de la boca de aquel per la intrinscequa medicina, per so que no deyssenda de aquela deguna causa sobre le golayro de lu e que ledesca aquel.	The tip of the hollow part where the medicine is placed should be like that of a spoon with a rounded bowl; place the instrument with the medicine on his tongue, and have the patient lean onto his side so he may spit out any saliva or mucus from his mouth due to this intrinsic medicine, so as not to allow anything to descend through his throat.
E aprop te la tua ma am la medicina, e exprem aquela sobre la uvula per l’espazi de miega hora entro que vegas aquela esser denegrada e sedada per la mordicacio de la medicina.	And then place your hand on the medicine and squeeze it onto the uvula for a quarter of an hour until it becomes discolored and soothed by the action of the medicine.
E si vols, prengues coto e envolopes aquel sobre la extremitat del ray, e submergeys le coto en la medicina, e entrometas le ray am le coto en una canula de sobre entro que·l coto adheresca en aquela canula, e fay aquo tantas vetz entro que consiegues aquo que vols de la cauterizacio de la uva, e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela se seccara e cayra aprop tres dias o quatre.	And if you wish, take a cork and wrap it around the end of the tube, then dip the cork in the medicine and insert the tube with the cork into a sheath for as long as necessary until you achieve the desired cauterization of the grape, and after that let it be three or four days before removing it.
E si indigeysses que iteras la medicina, itera aquela, e aprop la cauterizacio abstergeys en le circuit de la uva am coto enbegut en boder, e mondifica am aquel aquo que es en le circuit de lu de la medicina, e sia lavat am aygua frega, e sia curat deforo am embrocacio, e dedintz am guarguarismes entro que sia sanat.	And if you need to repeat the application of medicine, do so and after the cauterization process clean around the grape with a cork soaked in wine, modify it with whatever is in the vicinity of the medicine, wash it with warm water and treat externally with an ointment or cream, and internally with mouth rinses until it heals.
E aquesta especia de curacio es pus salva que inscizio e pus long de temor.	And this kind of treatment is more effective than incision, yet longer to fear.
Alcunas veguadas es curada la uvuola am aquo que es pus subtil que cauteri e inscizio, quar es curat am subfumigacio en aquesta manieyra: recipe calament, ysop, origua, ruda, scicados arabic, camamilla, broyda e semblant ad aquels de las erbas, e ajusta totas aquelas causas, o alcunas de lor, en una ola, e sian submergidas am vi agre, e bulhan; e la ola sia be lutada am lut decentment, e sia en le mieg loc de la ola un trauc, sobre le qual sia pausat un instrument conquau de aram segon aquesta manieyra; sia fayt de argent o de aram.	Some patients are cured of the uvula with something more subtle than cauterization and incision, as it is healed by subfumigation in this manner: Take cumin, hyssop, oregano, rue, Arabic incense, chamomile, broccoli and similar herbs, mix all or some of these ingredients together into a bowl, cover them with vinegar and boil; the bowl should be well sealed with appropriate wax and have an opening in its center upon which is placed an instrument like so: made of silver or brass.
E sia entromesa la extremitat en la boca del malaute entro que la vapor poge a la uvula sobre la quanula, entro que la uvula sia mot ofuscada.	Understood! Here is my translation attempt for your provided Latin-like text into English line by line:
