E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament: Then place and keep another thumb or even a third if needed in the affected person's position to ensure equal traction, not just extension following its straight line.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu: It should be bent in all directions so that its discharge is alleviated just as it is done with the extraction of teeth.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut: And in it what is between them should be softened with extension; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife must grease her fingers with oil and carefully insert them and stir up that which is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the wound is neglected and left untreated, the nails should be trimmed in such a way that they are shifted towards an area that is less important or significant; do this before all parts of the wound have been treated.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if one hand is more affected than the other and it cannot be treated with a similar procedure, then wrap cloth around that hand; remove the affected hand after ensuring all parts have been neglected or ignored, and make an incision either at the wrist joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And similarly, do this to the other hand and both feet as well.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	However, if the head of the wound is large and it occurs during extraction or if there is pus accumulating in the head of the wound, then you should insert something between the said spinal bones to split open the head and remove the pus; or use an instrument called an "alundat" to scrape out the pus. The shape of this instrument will be described like that of other instruments in the following chapter.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Similarly, do the same if the wound has a large head due to its nature: you should make an incision with an "algematu," or scrape out the contents using an "alundat," as mentioned earlier; then remove the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	Here is my translation of your provided text:
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated and there are no obstructions, then you can proceed to incise the head as soon as you find it feasible.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the abdomen is full of pus or there is dropsy present, it is necessary to puncture it in order to drain out the excess fluid.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the child is delivered through the feet first, its traction towards the mother's birth canal will be gentle and so will its direction towards her mouth.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	If the infant's body is contracted in its belly and feet, you must first extract it using cloth wrapped around your hand to grasp it firmly and then cut open the belly and the feet until whatever was inside comes out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other limbs remain inside and only the head is delivered, then the midwife should insert her left hand; however, if the mother's birth canal is open enough, she should place her hand on top of the infant's nose, grasp it with both hands, pull towards the mother's mouth using these two, and subsequently put one or two fingers inside its mouth to draw it out.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mother's birth canal is narrowed due to pus caused by an infection in her womb which happened during delivery, it must not be dilated further. Instead, one should apply a warm emollient wash.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply plasters; keep the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	If the wound is on their side, then sew it up if you can: and administer what we have said for a living person's injury.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then cut it into pieces and extract [the wound].
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	Make sure you leave no cause for infection inside the incision.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operations, then administer what we have said about the cure for those abscesses which occur from a mother [abscess].
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	If there is a flow of blood, then immerse [the wound] in astringent waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	I have seen a woman whose fetus was dead in her womb, and immediately after that another pregnant woman, and the other fetus was also dead.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	There happened to her after some time an abscess in her navel; and it swelled up so that it became open, and she began to shake her arms.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called upon to care for him, treating him for a long time, but the wound has not healed.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Therefore, I applied to him several plasters with strong adhesive properties and extracted a bone from his body. After some days passed, another bone was removed as well. I was amazed because there is no bone in the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then, I realized that it must be bones from the deceased fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	So I examined the wound and extracted many bones from her, as she was in her last month of pregnancy and had been suffering like this for a long time, with an arm of the baby protruding.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not consider this to be strange, but rather it is a matter of science and a tool that assists the doctor in his healing practice.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Regarding the types of instruments required to extract the fetus:
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	A cup-shaped instrument, which is placed over the mother's womb:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a book press where two cups are placed on each end of two posts.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	May this device be made of a more delicate material than the constrictor, and let it be crafted from ivory or wooden shaft.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And let the width of each wooden shaft be two fingers wide and the margin on both sides one finger in length; The length of each should be one palm and a half. At the middle point where the pair meet, there are two joints, which have been firmly fastened together; these joints are half a palm long and somewhat longer than two fingers in width.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	These two additions are inserted into the mother's mouth, which has been opened with the aid of those two previously prescribed devices.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Here is another similar device that is more delicate and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of ivory or wooden shaft in the form of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the end of these two additions are further appendages; The length of each appendage is one palm and their width measures two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you wish to open the mother with these, have the woman sit down with her feet apart and expose what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument, just as you would with scissors, according to the amount you want of the baby's mouth, while the midwife does what is necessary.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertigo that the ancients described as:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	A spinning sensation caused by an object moving around the fetus.
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	The type of friendship that is shattered when the head is severely injured.
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	Forceps are assembled with teeth at the end, like tongs, and sometimes they are made long like forceps according to this form, having teeth like those of a saw which are sharpened and hardened.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	A type of friendship that is fleeting or temporary.
Forma de unci havent una spina:	A form of hook having one spine.
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	A type of hook with two spines or prongs.
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	The form of forceps that has teeth for closing, used when the baby's head is impacted.
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	A type of spatula with two ends, used for cutting off the baby's head.
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Forma de dos espatums latz means "Two spatulas wide.
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat translates to "All these instruments are prepared and exercised, and as more species of them are multiplied and well-prepared by the artisans, they become lighter in operation and serve people better due to their abundance.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	This line is translated as "Do not be without any of these instruments, for the need for them cannot be excused." The text emphasizes the importance and necessity of having a complete set of medical tools and instruments at hand.
De extraccio de la segondina.	De extraccio de la segondina translates to "Regarding the extraction of the second-degree hernia." This appears to be a heading or title for the following medical procedure described in the treatise.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	Here is the translation: 
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	Here is my best attempt at translating the provided text:
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them should be submerged in water on the stove, and place it over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	Then place a cane tube in the mother's mouth, and keep it there until the vapors reach the mother's cavity.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	Make her sneeze as we have mentioned before, and the second baby will be quickly pushed out.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment remains incomplete and the baby is not born, you must instruct the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or an infusion of marshmallow root, then insert it into the womb and search for the second baby with that hand; once found, gently pull it out as described. If it is still attached to the mother's belly, you should follow our advice about inserting your hand, but when you find the second baby, remove it slowly so that the mother does not suffer from a strong traction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Wait until the baby is easily turned to the right and left sides.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	Then it should be adjusted according to the amount of traction, for it will obey and escape from adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the wound is constricted, we have already recommended treatment with sneezing and herbal medication to treat the swelling.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	However, if you do not forget all the causes we have recommended earlier, make sure not to tire yourself by repeating an act of abstraction. Instead, cover what is protruding from it at the mouth of the wound with a piece of cloth for the patient's thigh, and then anoint that with ointment and tetrafarmacon; this will rot it in a few days, and it will dissolve and be forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when you rise, a bad odor rises to the head and stomach, harming the patient. Therefore, it is necessary that they be administered appropriate fumigations and remedies for this.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	Some of the Ancients have already experienced fumigation with nard and dry figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The method of the instrument with which the woman is fumigated should be for retention of menstruation and the secondary fever:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of glass or silver.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And place the thin end in the bell and the wide end over the fire, and let the smoking be done over the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep doing this until that is consumed, then do another one.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	For the treatment of an unperforated infant's anus.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	If an infant is born with its anus unperforated, which was discovered to be very narrow and blocked.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then ask the midwife to perforate its anus with her finger; otherwise, do it yourself with a sharp spatula, and be careful not to touch the rectum.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	Then cover it with wool soaked in wine and oil, and cure it with ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear it is still blocked, then insert a cannula into the perforation for several days, and remove it when the infant wants to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And it can happen that the anus becomes blocked due to a blood clot or abscess; then you need to incise that clot and cure it with what we have said about treatment with lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de the una partida.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is either a fistula or wounds.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	When that abscess is old and full of watery white pus or subtle rot, some nearby are caused by those fistulae penetrating.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those penetrating fistulae are known for what comes out of them through the exit and windiness; sometimes patients call it an exit wound, but often they're barely visible.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	Some of these fistulae are nearby in the space penetrating into the bladder and urethra; some penetrate the hip joint and reach the bone of the thigh.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	To know if a fistula is penetrating or not into the anus, insert your finger into the anus and gently probe with something thin made of horn or iron into the fistula when it isn't twisted.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if it is twisted, insert a thin lead or horsehair probe into the fistula until you feel the probe or hair with your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you don't feel it at all and nothing comes out of the fistula like worms or wind, as we've said before, then you know it's not penetrating; you can begin treating it.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those fistulas, it is not a complete cure as the treatment of such conditions are laborious and dependent on the skill and knowledge of foolish physicians.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But for those that are not penetrated and are fresh, a cure with an iron is hoped for as I will tell you, and this is something I have already experienced.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And if the patient's legs are placed between your arms with their knees raised towards their stomach and their thighs inclined towards their belly, then insert a lead or brass probe, depending on whether it is for a tortuous fistula, knowing well where to place the probe.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the patient feels it around their anus, then you must insert your finger into their anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel with your finger that the probe has already penetrated through to the other side, or something else that feels like flesh or skin in between your finger and the probe, then you can be certain that it is a penetrating fistula; and so do not attempt to treat this, as there is no cure for such a condition, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But nonetheless, some may say that it is curable in some men later on.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	Here is my translation of the provided source sentence: 
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat those with scabs wrapped in bandages so that all the attached flesh does not come off, and treat them with medications that generate and consolidate flesh, and if it is healed, it is good; otherwise, it will never be cured by any other treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters and does not penetrate into the finger which is in the anus, and between that and the probe there is a thin layer of flesh or membrane, and sometimes the fistula coincides with the surface of the canal, then dry out the canal from the beginning of the fistula, also dry the probe, and it should be introduced into the fistula until the section reaches the place where the tip of the probe comes through, and by means of the probe it is freed and caught.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	Then cleanse those fistulated flesh that are assembled like the quill of a bird's feather and do not leave any cause.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if a flow of blood sometimes comes between you and your operation while you are removing those flesh, then whatever it may be and however light the pus is, cauterize with fire or with sharp medicine, because cauterization with fire adjusts two good customs: adherence of that flesh adjusted, and excision of blood by extraction of humidity.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then treat the wound that is covered with scabs or dressed with a piece of cloth until the place heals and then it cures the plague with hard ointment to produce and consolidate." 
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And in cases where medications with astringent and excision qualities are used, once the condition is restored it has been healed and there's no fear of recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has already penetrated into the region of the anus and is elongated from its surface, then insert your finger into the anus and examine it carefully.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And so if you cut open the fistula and find it is lined with a thin membrane or flesh, and it is close to being penetrated, then surgery is not required but rather trust in God's will and hope for recovery.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	Which can be treated in one of three ways: either cauterize the area as we mentioned earlier; or cut into it to reach its cavity so that you may, if possible, insert your finger and cure it immediately; do not hesitate to operate due to fear of damaging the anus beyond repair by cutting too deep, lest God's will be ignored and recovery hindered; then treat him with what has been said above for he shall surely recover; or elongate the membrane and drain the pus that lies within close to the anus, as we have mentioned earlier, either with a knife or other sharp instrument, and then modify the fistulous flesh in the incision by perforating it; thereafter strive to achieve complete recovery from the plague through incisions; if the external opening is not consolidated, but rather the fistula remains open near the anus, it shall be easier for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is treated in this manner: when you insert the probe into the fistula and it reaches the side of the buttocks near the surface of the body with the chain, and on the margin of the buttocks, then take a perforated sharp probe, which is like a needle used to prepare corneas according to this shape:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	Then insert the probe into that fold of four folds or around them; and next, insert the pointed probe with the fold into the fistula until it reaches the cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if it penetrates the margin of the buttocks deep inside, then you extract the fold from that wound as you insert your finger into the anus; and pull out the end of the fold and join the two ends together, pinching each one, and leave them like this for a day or two. When you cut deeper with the fold into the flesh, squeeze it so that the flesh between the two ends of the fold is pinched together.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	Then treat the wound until it is healed and consolidated.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the orifice of the fistula is not penetrating, then make it penetrate in any way that you prepare, but do not put it into prison, as it is not for you to cut off the tailbone; and next, treat it so that it heals.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spinous process is such that it has a divided fistula: its curve is very sharp and one part is blunt, so as not to cut into what is unnecessary, sometimes like this.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	For the suturing of hemorrhoids that bleed during the incision of them.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids are of two types: either they resemble coals between the buttocks or they are like fat from grapes.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And there are small and large ones, some of which always bleed and are singular, others are numerous, some outside the anus, and some are at its extreme ends.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	However, those that are outside the anus tend to be of a less moist nature; from them runs yellow water or a small amount of blood with constant pain and is according to the colour of the body.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the cure for those that are inside the anus is to have the patient sit and press themselves until the anus opens, and the hemorrhoids will appear before you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you cut them with scissors or hold them with your nails (if you have them), and then cut the hemorrhoids at their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then treat those other ailments until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not comply with the evacuation, then treat the patient with a small cauterization, and wash it with water that is in the bowel, which should facilitate gentle evacuation when the patient is pressed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	However, if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then their cause is mild, and you should take them with your nail or a hook, grab them, and treat them with what we have mentioned until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	For the one who requires an incision, you must administer their suturing in this way: take covered thread and insert it into a needle, then extract the hemorrhoids from the affected areas above; make the needle penetrate through the root on the other side, and wrap both ends of the thread around that area below the needle, doing so longitudinally. Pull the hemorrhoid firmly with tension and secure the thread by extracting the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	Do this for all of them, leaving one unstitched to allow excess blood to drain from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	Then place on the buttocks a cloth soaked in rose oil or wax, and put that over their back, then tell the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Leave it there for as long as needed; when it is done, treat any blisters with ointment or another suitable cure.
De curacio de fistulas.	On the treatment of fistulas:
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Visible signs happen due to excision of the skin or natural constriction.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And since they are old and do not heal with that medicine, it is necessary for you to remove them with the edge of a spoon or your nail until they become moist and host a thin layer of pus on top, which prevents consolidation; then treat them so they may consolidate.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then you wash them with a strong poultice of pus, more violently than the first time, until they bleed and become excoriated; then treat them so that they heal.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	On treating skull fractures: it is key.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that 'alamermar' is key and it is nothing other than red nuts according to the color of the body similar to a clover head; they are made all over the body and especially in parts below the feet and calves, which you must anoint when there is pain.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize it as previously mentioned in this chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	A wart is a small, rough, elevated growth with a pitted center that often appears on the skin of children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	The treatment for it is to extend and press that area, or to pierce it with a needle or a hair that has been heated.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you wish, cauterize it as we have mentioned, using fire or sharp medical instruments.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And warts, whether flat or raised, have been eradicated using the instrument I mentioned.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	A mosquito bite is a small, fuzzy, or pitted elevation on the skin's surface that itches when scratched, and it appears all over the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	The treatment for it is to take a quill from an owl or an eagle, make sure it's sturdy, and place it over the mosquito on its edges so that the circle of the quill encompasses the insect's body; then, you rotate your hand with the quill to press down whatever is inside the circle of the mosquito, embed it into the flesh, and remove the mosquito from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, make this with an ivory or iron tube according to this form:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	The upper part of the tube should be tapered and slightly hollowed out (it is unpierced) and wrapped in such a way that its appearance on the finger is smoothed and its revolution.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you wish to cauterize the ant as mentioned earlier in the chapter on cautery for hernia:
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Regarding the form of instruments that will be administered to give cauterization:
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some cautery instruments are made of silver, copper, or melted and beaten ivory; sometimes these instruments are small and others large depending on what they will be used for: that which is administered to cure young children should be small, and those intended for people with tender bottoms should have smaller tips.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of large and thick cautery instruments:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the large cauterization instrument to which the bag is tied should be wide in this manner, and have an indentation where the bag is tied as shown below.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	Certainly, here is my translation of the provided text: 
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And it is a bag that shall be placed with medicines made from animal bladder or sheepskin, and its root shall be one palm.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And it shall be perforated with many small holes, just like a sieve; the space between these holes should be the thickness of a finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	Then place in these holes strong raw bile, about ten drips or so; attach the bag to it; and when you place the bag on him, tighten its head with a stick between two points with great compression, and cauterize each hole with an iron: Note that what is important here is filling the bag with medicine, which should be heated according to the patient's tolerance; make sure it's not too hot or too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	Then the patient should be turned on their back, and raise his legs up with a man or a ladder underneath them; afterward, lubricate the end of the iron with oil, egg white, or fenugreek mucilage, or similar; then insert it into the anus gently, and have the minister grab the bag and squeeze it with both hands, emptying its contents vigorously into the patient's intestines; remove the iron, and let the patient rest their legs on a wall.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine forces him to evacuate, let it be as often as possible; and if he sleeps for an entire night, it is more beneficial afterwards.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	But if you treat his intestinal disorders with a cold bath and evacuation of the bowels, then repeat the cauterization until he is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are hemorrhoids or painful abscesses in the anus, then use a gentle and soft clyster, like those used for treating children.
De curacio de las plaguas.	On the treatment of wounds:
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	I have already mentioned in the section on wound treatment what is suitable for this book, and now I will speak of treating them with manual methods and medicines according to their completeness.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, I say that wounds are diversified according to the cause of their formation and the location where they occur.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which wounds are sometimes formed include a blow from a rock, or incision with a sword or knife, or percussion with a lance, or with a club, or with an arrow, and similar cases due to various causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And I am recounting the cure for certain wounds so that you may apply that reasoning and rule over other similar cases.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	I shall start with the simple head wounds, for the discussion of more complex cases will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore, know that when a simple wound occurs on the head and there is no fracture, consider this: if it was caused by a blow from a stone or something similar, and the skull has only cracked slightly, but the wound is large, and you fear an imminent abscess formation, then cut and let out blood from the cephalic vein immediately. Do not delay; extract as much blood as their condition allows unless some reason prohibits phlebotomy, especially if little blood flows from the wound itself.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And phlebotomy should be the opposite of overfeeding; take care that the patient does not overeat and avoid giving them excessive amounts of wine or rich food.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	However, if any condition prohibits the reduction of food intake, then lessen their consumption of meat and wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And if an abscess forms over the wound, insert into it rose oil alone or wine that has been boiled down to increase its potency.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if you are sure of an abscess, then apply to the wound, if it is fresh, its own blood and a little of the powder that I will mention below.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed there, then apply some ointment until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	But if the wound is large or due to an incision of space and skin, and its lips are not properly aligned for closure, then you should align them with sutures as I will recommend below.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	But if the wound has already exposed the bone and membrane, and there is no retention of it but rather a small suspension, then you should incise that area and treat the wound with medicines; restore the flesh in its place without any codename, and instruct the patient to consume foods containing grease: such as capons, fowl, and meat so that they may compose themselves.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if the other part of the wound is also putrefied and does not adhere to the bone, then you should incise all that rotten part and remove it, afterwards treat the area.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	But if in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which a flow of blood may come out, and it is not stopped by medicines, then you should inquire about the artery; if you find that it is still uninjured, then you must incise it with a spatula or tie it off. If what we have said does not work for your needs, then cauterize until the blood has been cut off.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	Certainly! I will translate the given text as you've requested: 
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And then squeeze that one with pillows and leave it like this, and do not release it while it is like this so that the medicine is not lifted from him before he is healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes it does this alone with caution, when neither myrrh nor dragon's blood is available to you.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And perform this meticulous operation on large wounds when it is appropriate to place them under pressure and they are fresh with their blood, wounds that have not been altered by the air.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	But if the air has altered them, especially in summer time, then it is not appropriate to use this compress; instead treat them with what we have said before and apply some digestive ointments or a mixture of barley flour with water and honey until they stop festering; and then cure them with another treatment so that they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if there is an open fracture of the bone, even small, then you should remove it with a styptical.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will tell the cure for fractures of the head, which is venomous.
De las plaguas del col.	De las plaudits del col." 
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	Do not place any cold substance on the wound, for the nerves are delicate and their connection goes up to the brain, which is the highest of all body parts.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	If this is to be treated with light medicines, it should be washed with warm water, sometimes infused with rose oil or plain oil, and touched with other healing stones according to this manner, and humidified.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	But if the wound is big, then stitch it or tighten its lips, and cure that with powders until it heals.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	But if the wound is deep or reaches to its lowest part of hardness, then pierce it in its deepest place.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	But if the artery has already been cut and there is bleeding, then separate or dry it up, tie it off, or cauterize it if need arises from that.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	But if the vertebrae of the neck have been cut and only the veins of the neck are saved, then adjust the lips of the wound with sutures over the spine of the neck without touching it; rather push that aside and return it to its natural form, then strengthen it with a decent bandage, leave it loose for some days; and cure it with ointments in which there is stypticity (astringency) and excitement until it heals.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquella, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the plague is recent, then sprinkle powder over it which has been prescribed for you.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	However, if the plague has formed a fistula, then treat it with what is mentioned in its respective chapter.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	For the plagues of the neck or similar, which are caused by a knife, dagger, lance, or other sharp object.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a lance or dagger wound and you wish to know its depth, then consider whether air comes out when the patient blows through their nose; in that case, be aware that the plague is deadly.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if there is no great depth to the wound and the plague is still fresh with its blood, then place on it powder during the first hour, but do not strain that person so as not to cause the blood to be held back in their body and return to the heart, which would aggravate their illness; instead, apply an attractive ointment, and let them rest twice a day.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the ointment is not available, then you should place on the wound opening as much flax as possible to draw out the moisture; make the patient sleep upon that wound so that what is inside of it may run out.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	Here is my best attempt at translating the text: 
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	But if the healing of it is delayed and has always been open, then know that a fistula has already formed; therefore cure it with its appropriate treatment.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is due to an incision from a knife or a dagger, and it is simple in nature on the surface of the foot or back, then treat it with what was mentioned earlier regarding suturing, if it is large, or with powder, if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	But if there is already damage to the bone and some pieces are missing due to the injury, then you should turn the wound outward and try to extract those pieces if they are separated.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	If they are not separated, then leave them inside until the wound dries up a bit, as their extraction will be easier.
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And for other accidental wounds in the remaining body parts, the guidance for healing is the same as what has been mentioned above.
De las plaguas del ventre.	On wounds of the abdomen:
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The discomfort that occurs in the abdomen can be either severe, mild, or moderate.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	Due to the large number of wounds and hernia cases, it is necessary for them to be treated with greater care so that their recovery can be faster.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	A small rupture can be difficult to treat in other ways, and if their reduction is more challenging, it's essential not to delay the procedure because a delay will lead to further swelling and make the insertion of the hernia into its place much harder.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	Therefore, the best hernia to treat is one that's medium-sized because in such a case, reducing the intestine back into its place is not challenging as it would be with the two previously mentioned types.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	Be aware that there are four different ways to suture the abdomen, and of these methods, two are common and appropriate for other wounds in the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	The other two suturing techniques are more general but can be adapted for various body wounds; however, they are particularly suitable for abdominal surgery.
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	I recommend that you study each of these methods in detail and clarify any doubts with your mentor or teacher.
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	In cases where a small wound prevents the hernia from being reduced due to its size or if swelling has occurred because of cold air exposure, it falls into one of two categories.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	Certainly! Here is the translation of your provided text into English:
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	And sometimes it happens that blood appears in the urine, and it is better than plain water for reducing inflammation.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	Once you see the inflammation being resolved, you moisten the intestine with water in which old bread and mallows have been soaked, for this will soothe its interior without causing much discomfort.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	But if it is necessary to treat the interior with this cure, then you divide the wound slightly with an instrument that has sharp edges.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	And the first cure is better when it is properly applied so that there is no need for incision, and it does not lead to excessive drying out or deficiency.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	As regards the instrument, take note of its shape:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	One part is sharp and curved, while the other part is blunt; its tip is fine but not as thin as a spatula, rather it is slightly rounded.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And when the wound is enlarged and the intestine has come out, it must be covered so that its reduction occurs in accordance with its natural shape, back into its proper place if at all possible, as this is best.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	And if the rupture is in one of the two parts of the abdomen, then keep your attention and consideration constantly focused on this so that the part where the plague is located is higher than the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	And thus, do this for large wounds as well as for medium-sized ones.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	For small wounds, apply your preparation and then instruct the patient to place their hands beneath where the rupture is located, with the palms of their hands facing towards each other and the fingers touching over the wound; thereafter remove any foreign object from the site of surgery before proceeding.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	This is the common method of suturing: once you have taken the needle and the appropriate number of threads for the size of the wound, leave one end of the thread on the tip of your ring finger; hold the needle with a firm grip in one hand but do not put any wax on either end of the thread or any other substance that is meant to keep its ends together when you are threading it through tissue from one side of an incision site because this could cause infection if left there too long during surgery—instead make sure both sides have been cleaned properly beforehand (with alcohol etc.). Once you've tied these two ends securely around something solid like bone within the body cavity itself–such as ribs which offer good support due their shape fitting neatly inside abdominal cavities - now you should begin making your stitches by pushing them through first one side then another until all four corners meet up nicely forming perfect squares.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	Under the thickness of the finger bend a double thread around the needle and sometimes in two parts together, then join both lips and the wound by suitable approximation; then allow the thickness of the finger and insert another needle into it, then link that with a thread like the first one was bound to the first needle; do not stop doing this if necessary with needles until you have completed all the suturing of the wound.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	If the needles are moderate between thickness and fineness because fine needles only slightly penetrate the flesh and thick ones are difficult to insert into the skin; therefore they should be moderate in terms of both thinness and thickness.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio.	The needle should not be inserted at the two ends of a fresh wound for this reason: that the flesh is not pierced lightly and that the wound opens up before it has healed.
E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	And they should not be prolonged in terms of suture because this prevents the wound from healing.
E aprop inscideys las extremitatz de las agulhas per so que no ledescan le malaute deves le sieu dormier; e pausaras sobre la sutura pulvils expanduts de tota partida, les quals tenguan las extremitatz de las agulhas; e layssa aquelas entro que sapias que la plagua ja es consolidada.	Then pierce the ends of the needles so that they do not harm the patient while he sleeps and place over the suture powdered spices that cover the ends of the needles, and leave them there until you know for sure that the wound has healed.
E aquestas specias de sutura am agulhas en cal manieyra es pus convenient en las plaguas petitas, quar habasta en la sutura de lor una agulha o doas o entorn aquelas.	And this type of suture with needles is most appropriate for small wounds, as it requires only one or two needles around the wound.
Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	The second type of suture is called 'cominal': it involves stitching all four edges, two ends of the gape, in one go with a needle that has fine thread wrapped around, depending on its fineness and thickness.
E aprop quan am la agulha auras penetrat aquestas quatre extremitatz, reduzeys la agulha de aquela meteyssa partida de la qual comensest, per so que le fiel retrayt caja de la pus subirana partida a la plagua, per so que la sutura sia segon sutura de drap am la qual les draps so strengutz.	Then, once the needle has pierced these four edges, return the needle from the same entry point it began with, so that the thread is pulled out of the higher opening of the wound, resulting in a suture like that of cloth, where the cloths are tightly bound.
E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	Place between each suture an amount equivalent to the thickness of the little finger.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	This suture is known as 'sutura sabo' by doctors. 
E am tal sutura yeu cozegui la plagua la qual era accidida a un home en le sieu ventre le qual era stat plaguat am un cotel, e era la disrrumpcio de la plagua major de un palm, e era eyssit dels budels entorn dos palms del budel del mieg loc e era la disrupcio en le mieg del membre; e adonc yeu reduzegui aquel depus que le budel havia stat foro la plagua per xxiiii horas.	With this type of suture, I closed the wound of a man who was stabbed in his abdomen with a knife, and the rupture of the wound was larger than a palm, with intestines protruding about two palms' width from the intestine's middle section; and so I reduced those after the intestine had been exposed for twenty-four hours through the wound.
E la plagua fo consolidada en le spazi de xv dias o entorn, e curegui aquel e es sanat; e aprop aquo visquec per motz ans, e es conversat en las suas disposicios.	And the plague was consolidated in the space of fifteen days or so, he cured him and he recovered; then he lived for many years and remained in good health.
E les autres metges havian jutgat que no fora sanat; e per miracle foc, quar yeu no curegui aquel am enguent, quar era en loc en le qual enguent no era atrobat ni deguna medicina, mays pausegui sobre la plagua coto viel dos veguadas lo dia e ablucio assiduo am aygua de mel entro que foc sanat.	And other doctors had judged that he would not be cured; but a miracle occurred, for I did not treat him with any ointment or medicine, only by applying warm cotton twice a day to the affected area and washing it diligently with honey water until he was healed.
Mays yeu diyre dos specias de sutura proprias segon narracio de Paraula.	But I will tell you about two specific types of suturing techniques, according to the teachings of the Bible.
E es que tu comenses am sutura de la codena, e entrometas agulha de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz.	It is you who starts the suturing with a whip stitch, inserting the needle from outside to inside.
E donc cum la agulha penetra en la codena e en aquel meteys lacertz segon rectetut e en longetut de tot le cos, e layssa la extremita del ciphac en le qual has entromesa la agulha; e fay penetrar en la autra extremitat la agulha de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo en l’autra extremitat del mihat.	And so, as the needle pierces the wound and passes through it in both directions along the length of the entire cut, leave the tip of the suture on one side where you inserted the needle; then pass the needle from inside to outside at the other end of the incision.
